医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
需要采取紧急行动对抗抗菌素耐药性并实现欧盟 2030 年目标2019年至2023年间，欧盟抗生素消费量增长了1%，距离欧盟理事会建议的2030年减少20%的目标进一步遥远。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Urgent-action-needed-to-combat-AMR-and-achieve-EUs-2030-targets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Urgent-action-needed-to-combat-AMR-and-achieve-EUs-2030-targets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3347cd9a-e5e4-430a-a784-a8b7e2affc85 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 13:52:04 -0500 Urgent action needed to combat AMR and achieve EU's 2030 targets
研究调查氧疗对 COVID-19 肺炎患者氧化应激的影响严重的 COVID-19 肺炎通常需要高浓度的氧气，这可能会导致氧化应激和肺损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-investigates-impact-of-oxygen-therapy-on-oxygen-stress-in-患者-with-COVID-19-pneumonia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-investigates-impact-of-oxygen-therapy-on-oxygen-stress-in-患者-with-COVID-19-pneumonia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acd90163-0463-4c26-83d7-6ba9c6eacb34 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 13:48:47 -0500 Study investigates impact of oxygen therapy on oxidative stress in patients with COVID-19 pneumonia
研究揭示皮肤癌中癌症相关成纤维细胞的多样性维也纳医科大学皮肤科的一项研究深入了解了白色和黑色皮肤癌中与癌症相关的成纤维细胞的多样性，并描述了它们在肿瘤环境中不同的免疫调节作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-uncovers-diversity-of-cancer- Associated-fascinated-in-skin-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-uncovers-diversity-of-cancer- Associated-fascinated-in-skin-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e5a8716-a7eb-4e3c-a90b-43d66ccb4496 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 13:41:00 -0500 Study uncovers diversity of cancer-associated fibroblasts in skin cancer
新研究将鞘脂与心脏病和动脉粥样硬化联系起来众所周知，过量的胆固醇会形成动脉阻塞斑块，从而导致中风、动脉疾病、心脏病等，这使其成为许多心脏健康运动的焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-research-links-sphingolipids-to-heart-disease-and-atherosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-research-links-sphingolipids-to-heart-disease-and-atherosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22642005-9b8f-4e66-8a8d-407546bc65a0 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 13:37:05 -0500 New research links sphingolipids to heart disease and atherosclerosis
研究深入了解低剂量氯胺酮如何缓解重度抑郁症的症状布法罗大学的神经科学家已经确定了低剂量氯胺酮的结合位点，为了解这种通常被称为神奇药物的药物如何在短短几个小时内缓解重度抑郁症的症状并持续数天的效果提供了重要的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-provides-insight-into-how-low-dose-ketamine-alleviates-symptoms-of-major-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-provides-insight-into-how-low-dose-ketamine-alleviates-symptoms-of-major-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b44e3e61-6cd1-4bda-9e90-9292bee3cebf Tue, 19 Nov 2024 13:30:30 -0500 Study provides insight into how low-dose ketamine alleviates symptoms of major depression
世界各地的饮食转变可能会缓解环境压力改变我们的饮食结构，使其更加可持续，对于我们每个人来说都是解决气候变化和全球粮食不安全问题的有力途径，然而，为了在全球范围内产生影响而进行必要的大规模调整可能是一件微妙的事情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Diet-shifts-around-the-world-may-ease-environmental-Pressures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Diet-shifts-around-the-world-may-ease-environmental-Pressures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2394dee5-0ec7-40c0-af37-40977961b2c8 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 11:42:29 -0500 Diet shifts around the world may ease environmental pressures
全球分析凸显抗生素消费趋势和抗菌素耐药性威胁一项新的研究强调了全球人类抗生素消费量近期但波动的增长，这是抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 不断增长的主要驱动因素之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Global-analysis-highlights-antibiotic-conspiration-trends-and-AMR-threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Global-analysis-highlights-antibiotic-conspiration-trends-and-AMR-threat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f0b2eaa-fd32-484f-a8a1-73e3242f7059 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 11:20:01 -0500 Global analysis highlights antibiotic consumption trends and AMR threat
研究揭示吸入屋尘螨如何引发过敏性哮喘匹兹堡大学的新研究揭示了吸入的屋尘螨（过敏性哮喘的常见诱因）如何激活免疫系统并导致小鼠患上这种疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Research-uncovers-how-inhaled-house-dust-mites-trigger-of-allergic-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Research-uncovers-how-inhaled-house-dust-mites-trigger-of-allergic-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4dd0960-e8b3-4887-a3c0-d749f6090c34 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 10:55:02 -0500 Research uncovers how inhaled house dust mites trigger of allergic asthma
研究揭示了预测心脏病的多基因风险评分的变异性多基因风险评分 (PRS) 是遗传学中的一种尖端工具，它结合了整个基因组中遗传标记的信息来估计一个人患某些疾病的风险，例如冠状动脉疾病 (CAD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-reveals-variability-in-polygenic-risk-scores-for-predicting-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-reveals-variability-in-polygenic-risk-scores-for-predicting-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2364250-90fe-4a99-a7b4-6d70fb740f3c Tue, 19 Nov 2024 10:42:09 -0500 Study reveals variability in polygenic risk scores for predicting heart disease
新型 CAR T 细胞疗法有望对抗侵袭性 HER2+ 乳腺癌三分之一的 HER2 阳性 (HER2+) 肿瘤表达 P95HER2 蛋白，该蛋白与预后较差的侵袭性乳腺癌有关。希伯伦谷肿瘤研究所 (VHIO) 生长因子小组的研究人员与巴塞罗那德尔马医院研究所 (HMRI) 癌症研究项目的研究人员合作，开发了新型嵌合抗原受体 (CAR) T 细胞可以对表达 p95HER2 的细胞产生有效的抗肿瘤反应的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-CAR-T-cell-therapy-shows-promise-against-aggressive-HER22b-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/New-CAR-T-cell-therapy-shows-promise-against-aggressive-HER22b-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3210d016-eaeb-4b61-b1d7-da675e46322c Tue, 19 Nov 2024 10:39:06 -0500 New CAR T-cell therapy shows promise against aggressive HER2+ breast cancer
